body:
Basic story as far as I can tell: Boy hears a rumor that if he pays her 808 yen, then she'll provide off-menu "services". She seems kinda pissed about it at first, but decides to see what he's working with, then is all OOOOH DICK!

So, either prostitution or slutting it up, but no mention of a husband (and no ring) so probably not NTR.

Btw does anyone know anything about Comic Ananga Ranga? Last month's vol 45 was never released and this months volume seems to be late as well. Might not be the best comic, but it has some good releases like the works from omecho or my favorite Kameyama Shiruko. Please help
Could be wrong, but the title implies that there's prostitution involved or just a fake rumor and I think it's a one shot and not a series, so ntr won't have a chance
Prob gonna turn into an NTR which sucks
any updates on whatever the fuck is going at the apparent multiverse ntr/non-ntr work?
Finally another etuzan-jakusui that is not ntr.
stop spreading lies, we still dont know if etuzan is he or she. the girl you see are doing the promotion for etuzan doujin.
v  Beat me to it. Amazes me that Etuzan, being a woman, can draw such beautiful females. Yet..maybe thats the reason in itself. ;p
